title: Real-Time Power Electronics Simulator
description: Web-based simulation platform for power converter design with real-time visualization and component sizing tools.
fullDescription:
This software project developed an interactive web-based platform for power electronics design and simulation. The tool enables engineers to quickly prototype converter topologies and visualize waveforms in real-time.

## Features

### Topology Library
- Buck, Boost, Buck-Boost converters
- Full-bridge and half-bridge configurations
- DAB and LLC resonant converters
- Three-phase inverters

### Design Tools
- Automated component sizing
- Loss calculation and efficiency estimation
- Thermal derating analysis
- Magnetics design wizard

### Visualization
- Real-time waveform plotting
- FFT analysis for harmonic content
- Bode plot generation
- Interactive parameter sweeps

## Technology Stack

Built with modern web technologies:
- React frontend with TypeScript
- WebGL-accelerated plotting
- Web Workers for simulation engine
- Cloud-based storage for projects
